unnormalised: Weather-dependent yields, eh? Tell me about it! Last year's monsoon in Maharashtra was brutal. Remember how delayed it was? Crops failed left and right, especially after that crazy heatwave on 10/05/2023. Farmers near Nagpur suffered terribly. Even my uncle, a veteran farmer since 1975, said he hadn't seen anything like it. Heard the ICAR is researching drought-resistant varieties. Hope it works before the 2024 monsoon hits, scheduled sometime around June 15th, 14:00 hrs.
normalised: Weather-dependent yields, eh? Tell me about it! Last year's monsoon in Maharashtra was brutal. Remember how delayed it was? Crops failed left and right, especially after that crazy heatwave on tenth May two thousand and twenty three. Farmers near Nagpur suffered terribly. Even my uncle, a veteran farmer since one thousand nine hundred and seventy five, said he hadn't seen anything like it. Heard the I C A R is researching drought-resistant varieties. Hope it works before the two thousand and twenty four monsoon hits, scheduled sometime around June fifteenth, fourteen zero zero hours.
